text: Czesław Krakowski (7 June 1950 – 21 January 2022) was a Polish politician. He was a member of the Polish People's Party. He was in the Senate of Poland from 1993 to 1997. He was born in Płock, Poland. Krakowski died in Płock on 21 January 2022, at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish politicians
title: Czesław Krakowski
